assetProfile.address2: Courtyard Marriott Compound Opposite Big Cinema, Andheri-Kurla Road Hanuman Nagar, Andheri East
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Smartlink Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, markets, distributes, and services networking products in India. The company operates in two segments, Investment and Networking Products. It offers networking products, such as switches, broadband routers, wireless LANs, and GPON and GePON under the DIGISOL brand name. The company also develops and manufactures copper and fiber range of cabling products, which include cabling solutions, patch panels, patch cords, fiber cables and connectors, couplers, etc.; manufactures electronic products for the IT, networking, and telecom industries; and provides technical assistance center services. In addition, it offers real estate services. Smartlink Holdings Limited also exports its products to other countries internationally. The company was formerly known as Smartlink Network Systems Limited and changed its name to Smartlink Holdings Limited in April 2018. Smartlink Holdings Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Mumbai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Kalpak  Bhatt
companyOfficers.title: Regional Sales Head for Western Part
